text: one reader asks with all you've seen and
reported on what gives you hope for the
future we got a lot of other questions
like that I'd say that people always
would have expect that if you're going
around war zones or brothels in Cambodia
and these other things he will come back
incredibly depressed but in fact the
truth is that I often come back from
these places frankly with a kind of
renewed faith in humanity because you
tend to see the worst of the world in
these places you see warlords use the
brothel owners and you just want to
wring their necks but you also see the
most unbelievable aid workers local
people who are fighting back people who
are expressing their humanity by trying
to help others around them and that is
what I come back with from my trips
truly inspired by the carriage and
humanity so many people
